creator: bart.vanassche+asf@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 22968
Patch that fixes this bug

From config.log:

configure:12100: checking if gcc supports -fno-rtti -fno-exceptions
configure:12118: gcc -c -g -O2 -DLINUX=2 -D_REENTRANT -D_GNU_SOURCE -fno-rtti -f
no-exceptions conftest.c >&5
cc1: warning: command line option "-fno-rtti" is valid for C++/ObjC++ but not fo
r C
configure:12122: $? = 0
configure:12135: result: no

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: This seems to be a libtool issue. Please report it to the libtool guys.
